name: Bollossage d'Humain
description:
Game Objective

Kill the maximum of human and disturb other players.

CONTROLS

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Fire (with Ammo and kill other players)

Left Shoulder Trigger - Dash (kill human and stun other players)

Make in 24h in a jam with keyword "backpack" for subject.
